name: Robin Carter

what_you_do: After a distinguished career in HR and Talent Acquisition, Robin is dedicated to helping businesses build strong, people-centered organizations, develop authentic leaders, and guide professionals through transformative career transitions.
who_you_serve: For businesses, Robin provides expert consulting tailored to your unique needs, helping you navigate employment laws, employee relations, policies, and procedures, and works with you to attract, retain, and develop top talent. For individuals, Robin specializes in coaching mid-to-late-career professionals seeking a fresh start and aspiring leaders ready to step into their potential.
signature_programs: Soul Leadership - Heartfelt Leadership, Inspire, Empower, and Lead with Purpose; Divine Communication; Mastering the Art of Connection
business_focus: Helping businesses build strong, people-centered organizations and guiding professionals through transformative career transitions.
service_provided: Career coaching, leadership development, HR consulting
